info.title: Match games
info.description: The Toornament platform connects your website and application with the eSports tournaments around the world.

get.summary: Retrieve the games of one match.
get.description: Returns the games of the given match. If the game type is "ffa", this list is limited to the first 4 opponents ordered by their position.

get.summary: Get detailed information about one match game.
get.description: Returns detailed information about one match game.

patch.summary: Update information and outcome of a game.
patch.description: Updates a single game of the given match. A game is limited to 2 participants in "duel" type, and 100 participants in "ffa" type.

get.summary: Retrieve the games of a match.
get.description: Returns the games of the given match. If the match type is "ffa", only the first 4 opponents, ordered by position, are listed in each game.

get.summary: Retrieve a single game from a match.
get.description: Returns a single game of the given match. A game is limited to 2 participants in "duel" type, and 100 participants in "ffa" type.

patch.summary: Update information and outcome of a game.
patch.description: Updates a single game of the given match. A game is limited to 2 participants in "duel" type, and 100 participants in "ffa" type.

gameRange.name: Range
gameRange.description: A range of requested items using the 'games' unit. The size of the range can not exceed 50. (see [Pagination](https://developer.toornament.com/v2/overview/pagination))

gameNumber.name: number
gameNumber.description: The relative identifier of the match game to retrieve.

status.description: The status of the game, set to NULL for an automatic update of the status.

opponents.description: List of the opponents involved in this match-game.
List of the opponents involved in this match-game.

properties.description: Discipline features that define the specifics of the match game.

number.description: A relative identifier between 1 and the total number of games, to identify the game within the match.

status.description: The status of the match game. "Pending" means the game has not started yet. "Running" means the game is ongoing. "Completed" means the game is over.

opponents.description: List of the opponents involved in this match-game.

properties.description: Discipline features that define the specifics of the match game.

number.description: The match-game opponent number (a relative identifier within a match).

position.description: The match-game opponent position (calculate by internal processes).

result.description: The match-game result of the opponent.

rank.description: The match rank of the opponent.

properties.description: Features of the game played by the opponent.
Features of the game played by the opponent.
